h1.base: margin: 32px 0 20px; font-size: 2em; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, #3E2723, transparent); height: 2px;
h1.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #3E2723; background: #FFF8E1; padding: 0 15px; position: relative; top: -14px;

h2.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #FFF; background: #5D4037; padding: 2px 10px 2px 8px; clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 95% 100%, 0% 100%);

h3.after: display: inline-block; width: 6px; height: 6px; background: #8D6E63; border-radius: 50%; margin-left: 8px; vertical-align: middle;

code.block: color: #3E2723; background: #D7CCC8; border-radius: 2px; border: 1px solid #A1887F; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
code.inline: background: #EFEBE9; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 2px; color: #5D4037; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #D7CCC8;

styles.quote: border: none; border-left: 3px double #5D4037; border-right: 3px double #5D4037; padding: 15px 20px; background: #EFEBE9; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #5D4037; font-family: 'FangSong', serif; text-align: center;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border: 5px solid #D7CCC8; outline: 1px solid #A1887F; padding: 2px;
styles.link: color: #8D6E63; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px dashed #8D6E63; font-weight: bold;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid #8D6E63;
table.header: background: #D7CCC8; font-weight: bold; color: #3E2723; border-bottom: 2px solid #8D6E63; font-size: 1em;

styles.hr: border: none; height: 1px; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, #8D6E63, transparent); margin: 30px 0;
